statements: SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_data;
SELECT machine_id, sensor_reading, timestamp FROM predictive_maintenance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, AVG(sensor_reading) FROM predictive_maintenance_data GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_data WHERE sensor_reading > 50;
SELECT machine_id, MAX(sensor_reading) FROM predictive_maintenance_data GROUP BY machine_id ORDER BY MAX(sensor_reading) DESC;
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_data ORDER BY machine_id ASC, sensor_reading DESC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT machine_id, AVG(sensor_reading) AS avg_sensor_reading FROM predictive_maintenance_data GROUP BY machine_id HAVING AVG(sensor_reading) > 50
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_data WHERE machine_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(DISTINCT timestamp) AS unique_timestamps FROM predictive_maintenance_data GROUP BY machine_id ORDER BY unique_timestamps DESC
SELECT AVG(sensor_reading) AS avg_sensor_reading, MAX(sensor_reading) AS max_sensor_reading, MIN(sensor_reading) AS min_sensor_reading FROM predictive_maintenance_data
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_data;
SELECT sensor_id, value, timestamp FROM predictive_maintenance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) FROM predictive_maintenance_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT task_id, sensor_id, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) FROM predictive_maintenance_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM predictive_maintenance_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(task_id) AS task_count FROM maintenance_tasks GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(task_id) > 0;
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_data WHERE value > 100 AND sensor_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM predictive_maintenance_data WHERE vibration > 0.5;
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_start_time > NOW();
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(task_id) AS task_count FROM maintenance_tasks GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING task_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM predictive_maintenance_data WHERE temperature > 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(vibration) AS avg_vibration FROM predictive_maintenance_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(vibration) > 0.5;
SELECT m.task_id, m.task_description, l.timestamp, l.log_message FROM maintenance_tasks m JOIN maintenance_logs l ON m.task_id = l.task_id ORDER BY l.timestamp ASC;

SELECT p.sensor_id, p.temperature, t.task_description, t.task_start_time, t.task_end_time FROM predictive_maintenance_data p JOIN maintenance_tasks t ON p.sensor_id = t.equipment_id WHERE p.temperature < 20 AND t.task_start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY t.task_start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%temperature%';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, start_date, end_date FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE status = 'in progress';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Factory A';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT task_name, status FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_data;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, sensor_data FROM predictive_maintenance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, MAX(sensor_data) AS max_sensor_data FROM predictive_maintenance_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_events WHERE event_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT device_id, event_type, event_time FROM maintenance_events JOIN maintenance_logs ON maintenance_events.event_id = maintenance_logs.event_id;
SELECT * FROM predictive_maintenance_data;
SELECT device_id, sensor_data FROM predictive_maintenance_data WHERE sensor_data > 0.5 ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(sensor_data) AS max_sensor_data, MIN(sensor_data) AS min_sensor_data FROM predictive_maintenance_data;
SELECT device_id, event_type, event_time FROM maintenance_events JOIN maintenance_schedule ON maintenance_events.device_id = maintenance_schedule.device_id;
SELECT device_id, task_description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE task_description LIKE '%inspection%' ORDER BY scheduled_time ASC;
